_sText:
It was named zombie_cargoship(_b2)

Now , we made zm_cargoship_remix  but it's not really a remix, there are just more places to hide , secrets places , teleporters ...

All the credits for the original map go to Archanor

All the credits for the "remix" parts go to Diablos and me

If you have any questions :
Steam : lesamourai
Xfire : lesamourai

Installation :

Put the .bsp file in :
C:\Program Files\Valve\Steam\SteamApps\Your Steam ID\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps (Or something like that...)

Enjoy !

Thomasddqâ„¢
